detail.name: Smart Remote Control Motor Forward and Reverse Two-Way Remote Control for Electric Curtains and Projection Screen

details.description_text: Clearing methodAfter ensuring that the cord is correctly connected, the -on LED is always off, the "□" button for more than 8SThe LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the code clearing is completed Smart Remote Control Motor Forward and Reverse Two-Way Remote Control for Electric Curtains and Projection Screen Remote control pairing instructionsClearing methodAfter ensuring that the cord is correctly connected, the -on LED is always off, the "□" button for more than 8SThe LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the code clearing is completedNote: After clearing, the remote control that has been previously learned and paired no longer be controlledPairing method: and hold the "△" button on the controller for more than 4S, the LED light is always on, release the learning button and the "△" button on the remote control at the same time, wait until the LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the "△" key learning is completed; then and hold the "▽" button on the controller for more than 4S, the LED light is always on, release the learning button and the "▽" button on the remote control at the same time, wait until the LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the "▽" key learning is completed.Note for women: 1. The "△" key and "▽" key are learned separately; the "□" key can be controlled without learning;2. After powering on, the LED indicator light is always off. Regardless of manual or remote control operation, the LED light flashes once and the buzzer sounds once. details.description_text: Plug Type: US Color: Black DC5V/1A power adapter High tone quality, low noise Support CEC and HDCP Brand new and high quality Save your Money Best Choice and best discounts Customer Care is Our Top Priority Offer is Subject to Availability Big Sale Package Included: 1 x HDMI Digital Audio HDMI to HDMI + VGA + SPDIF 5.1CH HP DTS Adapter 1 x Power Adapter 1 x English user manual With 1x HDMI input and 1x HDMI output.1x VGA analog video sync output, 1x SPDIF optical digital audio and 6 channel RCA analog audio output that can connect with the amplifier or the TV directly. Features: 1.Model:51S 2.Brand new and high quality. 3.MHL/HDMI working in dual mode, support audio and video input in MHL mode, and can charge for MHL equipment. 4.Support HDMI input up to 1080P/60Hz, supports 3D (24/30fs). 5.Support CEC and HDCP. 6.Supports 3 modes of EDID management for audio formats, can switch among built-in EDID (2CH/5.1CH) and external EDID (TV). 7.Uses 24 bit/96KHz audio DSP and 24bit /192KHz DAC. 8.Support digital audio formats: Dolby digital (AC3), DTS, LPCM, automatic identification signal format. 9.VGA output resolution format with the input format automatically changes. 10.Headphone amplifier output, can drive the general 3.5mm earphone. 11.High tone quality, low noise. 12.DC5V/1A power adapter . Features of the interface: 1.SWITCH: Audio EDID mode switch. This switch allows users to select the source's audio EDID. 2.PASS: HDMI pass mode. Switch to PASS mode for the HDMI source to output audio per the EDID of connected TV or AV receiver, supports up to LPCM 7.1 channels. 3.2CH: 2CH LPCM mode. Switch to 2CH mode for the HDMI source to output LPCM 2 channels audio per the built-in EDID. Then HDMI, SPDIF, RCA and headphones output stereo audio. 4.5.1CH: 5.1CH bitstream Mode. Switch to B5.1CH mode for the HDMI source to output bitstream audio per the built-in EDID. Then HDMI, SPDIF and RCA output 5.1CH audio, headphone output from FL and FR channel. Operation and connection: 1.Connect one HDMI cable from a DVD/Blu-ray player into input port of decoder. 2.Connect one HDMI/VGA cable from TV/Monitor into output port of decoder. 3.If you need a digital audio, connect one optical fiber from digital power amplifier into the SPDIF output port of decoder. 4.If you need an analog audio, Connect six AV cables from analog power amplifier into the analog audio output ports of decoder, the channel must correspond. If the connected TV or stereo power amplifier, connect the FL/FR two channel only, and switch EDID mode in 2CH. 5.If you need to use the headphone output, pls switch EDID mode in 2CH. 6.Connect 5V power supply to the decoder and inserted into the power socket. 7.VGA output resolution format with the input format automatically changes. Support resolution formats as follows: 720×480-60Hz(480P),800×600-60Hz, 1024×768-60Hz, 1152×864-60Hz, 1280×720-60Hz(720P), 1280×768-60Hz, 1280×800-60Hz, 1280×960-60Hz, 1280×1024-60Hz, 1360×768-60Hz, 1366×768-60Hz, 1440×900-60Hz, 1600×900-60Hz, 1600×1200-60Hz, 1680×1050-60Hz, 1920×1080-60Hz(1080P). HighqualityandInexpensiveExquisiteWorkmanshipDurable in useWellMadeEnjoyGreatPopularityAmongthePeopleSaveyourMoney
